description:
The main objective of the course "GIMP Tutorial: Become а Designer With The Essential Guide" is to assist in the study of free GIMP graphics editor, as well as to inform users of the existence of simple, free software alternatives.

This course will turn out to be very useful for designers, bloggers, journalists or simply for those who are dealing with image editing.

You will find out exactly how to:

  • Work with the basic tools and options;
  • Create an outstanding effects on photo very fast and of a good quality;
  • Create various and interesting logos;
  • With the help of different patterns you can make marvelous graphic.

What will I learn after this course? Will it be helpful for me?

  • I’m offering about 20 lectures of sequential lessons and design tutorials;
  • You will find out how to start work with GIMP;
  • It will be incredibly easy for you to edit photos, create logos or to improve any image in GIMP;
  • Easy to use deign will help you on your path of creating perfect graphics and images. 

Who can apply for this course?

  •  Every person who is interested in creating graphics and pictures of a good quality, I may even say professional; 
  • All who want to learn about filters and easy ways to edit photos and create other design elements;
  • Self-published authors; 

Summing up I can say that this course will be your tool in creating perfect book covers, editing images and graphics. For those who are just beginning to work with their web-site or want to come up with memorable photos GIMP will be a fabulous solution. And what is also important the price of this program is FREE and you do not have to overpay.
title: GIMP Tutorial: Become а Designer With The Essential Guide
